knimeNode.name: Density Scorer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculates density scores given a density model.

fullDescription.intro: Calculates density scores for the input table given a density model. Note that the model can only be applied to the data it was initialized with in the corresponding initializer node (Potential Density Initializer or Graph Density Initializer).
fullDescription.option: Name of the appended density score column.

If this setting is set to ignore, unknown rows (i.e. rows that were not used for the creation of the density model) receive a missing value as density score. Otherwise the node will fail if it encounters such a row.

ports.inPort: Density scorer model created with either the Potential Density Initializer or the Graph Density Initializer node.
Table containing rows for which the current density score is required.
ports.outPort: The input table with an appended density score column. The name of the column can be specified via the Output Column Name option.
